name: Zombie Horde (itch) (Robin De Paepe, TwitchyWhalez, Maxim Eylenbosch)
name_original: Zombie Horde (itch) (Robin De Paepe, TwitchyWhalez, Maxim Eylenbosch)
description:
Be a zombie and feed on the flesh of humans while you run past the obstacle course. The more zombies you have in your horde, the more points you will rack up! Make it to the top of the leaderboards and take the title of zombie King!

We made this game with a small group in 3 days time for the Score Space game jam!

3th party usages:

Leaderboard used: https://dreamlo.com/

Animations: https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Team and contribution:

Robin De Paepe : Programmer and Unity editor 

Maxim Eylenbosch : Artist and Unity editor 

Twitchy Whalez : Music and sound effects

Asthmanaut: Characters 

Note

The leaderboard will not work in the web version so if you want to get on the leaderboard you will have to download a local version of the game trough the zip file. (see bottom of the page)
